summary: Expert contributor for the Ready AI in Sport course, successfully launched Jan 2024

role: AI Intern & Women in Sports Tech Fellow
summary: Developed training pipelines and performed model validation for the Wimbledon Tennis AI Commentary model
Trained a custom tennis classifier with >92% F1 and <0.03 sec latency for automated highlight package generation
Developed a novel sport-specific action recognition model to support Australian Olympic sports teams
Created a robust 3D sports motion dataset by simulating dynamic camera projections used in sports broadcasting
